noAccess.title: No access to your conversations
noAccess.description: We don't have access to your conversation content. All processing is done locally and your data is never stored.

aiAnalysis.title: 100% AI Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: All analysis is performed by advanced Artificial Intelligence, without human intervention, ensuring total privacy of your data.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to discover what your conversations say about you

step1.title: Open the conversation
step1.description: Select the conversation or group you want to analyze.

step2.title: Click export chat
step2.description: Tap the three dots in the top right corner, scroll down and select 'Export chat'.

step3.title: Choose 'Without media'
step3.description: Select the 'Without media' option to export only the text of conversations, creating a smaller and easier file to process.

retrospective.error: Oops! Something went wrong with your retrospective! Contact support, we'll help you!
